fields.name: Get involved in our community!!
fields.value: Hey! You just found the best way to get involved in the Cool-Oh community. Below you will find available quests based on your current level. Earn $COOL tokens to buy NFT perks and EXP points to reach higher levels in our community.

fields.name: Your Quests
fields.value: You aren't doing any quest at the moment

fields.name: If you need help
fields.value: If you need help with setting your Solana wallet, you can read the quest documentation by clicking on the quest title.
